agendas.name: Assassins
agendas.description: Track how many enemy Characters your units destroy. Each unit gains 1 XP per Character destroyed (max 3 XP).

agendas.name: Behind Enemy Lines
agendas.description: Select 1 unit - if it ends the battle wholly within the enemy deployment zone, it gains 3 XP.

agendas.name: Cull the Horde
agendas.description: Track how many enemy models your units destroy in melee. Each unit gains 1 XP per 10 models destroyed.

agendas.name: Kingslayer
agendas.description: Select 1 unit - if it destroys the enemy Warlord, it gains 2 XP.

agendas.name: Reaper
agendas.description: Track how many enemy units your units destroy. Each unit gains 1 XP per unit destroyed (max 3 XP).

agendas.name: Survivor
agendas.description: Select 1 unit - if it survives the battle, it gains 1 XP. If it survives at full strength, it gains 2 XP instead.

agendas.name: Secure Objective
agendas.description: Select 1 unit - if it controls an objective marker at end of battle, it gains 2 XP.

agendas.name: Priority Target
agendas.description: Select 1 enemy unit as the priority target. If you destroy it, the destroying unit gains 2 XP.

agendas.name: Domination
agendas.description: If you control more objective markers than your opponent at end of battle, all surviving units gain 1 XP.

agendas.name: Glory Seekers
agendas.description: Track kills by each unit. Units with 3+ kills gain 1 bonus XP.

agendas.name: Righteous Purgation
agendas.description: Track all enemy models destroyed by your army. Narrative tally - no XP reward.

agendas.name: First Blood
agendas.description: If you destroy the first enemy unit, the unit that destroyed it gains 1 XP.
